testCase.name: AppComponent should create
AppComponent should have as title 'BlueMark-academy'
Q1Component should create
Q1Component setCounter should increase the counter
Q1Component setCounter should decrease the counter
Q4 Q4Component should create
Q4 Q4Component addItem should increase the counter after clicking the button
Q4 Q4Component addItem should child component temp not exist in the beginning
Q4 Q4Component addItem should child component temp exist after clicking the button
Q4 Q4ChildComponent should create
Q4 Q4ChildComponent should p tag repeats as value
Q4 Q4ChildComponent should p tag text contains the for loop index
Q2Component should create
Q2Component search should search text bind into p html element
Q5 Q5Component should create
Q5 Q5Component onSubmit should set the name variable what has been sent to the method as a param
Q5 Q5Component onSubmit should p tag repeats as value
Q5 Q5ChildComponent should create
Q5 Q5ChildComponent should input value bind to value variable
Q5 Q5ChildComponent should button emits the input value through submit output
Q3Component should create
Q3Component search should search text bind into p html element
Q3Component fruits should return filtered Banana from the list regarding the search value
Q3Component fruits should return filtered Apple from the list regarding the search value
Q3Component fruits should return filtered Watermelon from the list regarding the search value
Q3Component fruits should return filtered Mango from the list regarding the search value
Q3Component fruits should li elements counter equals to filtered fruit list if fruits.length > 0
Q3Component fruits should li element show emptyValue text if fruits.length === 0
Q6Component should create
Q6Component should button has to be disabled if name input is empty
Q6Component should button not to be disabled if name input is not empty
Q6Component onSubmit should p tag not exist until form register completed
Q6Component onSubmit should p tag contains the name has been submitted from register form
